sentences.sentence: Myself and Anna were knocking back vodkas like there was no tomorrow.
sentences.translation: 我和安娜那时就在狂喝伏特加，好像明天就不复存在了似的。

sentences.sentence: Some nine vodkas later, Yuri was in fine form and had found a drinking partner in my husband!
sentences.translation: 大约喝了九杯伏特加后，尤里仍然意犹未尽，和我丈夫真是酒逢知己！

sentences.sentence: Its unforgettable taste and delicate aroma of Polish grains set a new standard among luxury vodkas.
sentences.translation: 其令人难忘的味道和波兰谷物的微妙香气，奠定了奢华伏特加酒中的一个新的标准。
